channel.title: Cleaned czar v4 event manager 18k lines removed
channel.description:
Updates in this version Event manager. More info file is now about 5 lines. More crap removed. Added a wearing handler. Moved all the timers out of process they are now handled by the event manager Conventions are now included in most of the files. (Takes ages)
Updates from V3 The client .java is now only 24k lines I have spent a lot of the saving methods in this version: No longer saves in .dats Handler for the saving methods. Moved some ints from client.java to player.java Deleted quite a lot of unnessary stuff You would not believe the amount of trash I found. Removed some useless handlers e.g Savegamehandler and another one playersave or something.
Updates from V2 Cleaned further. Command Handler. Action button handler. Fully working ip ban(Done properly) Completely configured to work with Stewie's client No long runs like a Czar I prefer to think of it as running like a Tate. Seperated Java and Class files.
Server download:) http://uppit.com/v/4YM1XH4B
Client(100% credits to stewie) http://www.mediafire.com/?dzogyc1jmwz

item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

walkineagle:

The client download link is an error

Works for me

Kingen50cent:

Umm this sounds confusing but is this like server control panel or what? idk what a event manager is can someone explain?

It is a server. It has Event Manager implemented.

V5 coming out now.

item.title: Cleaned czar v4 event manager 18k lines removed
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Updates in this version
Event manager.
More info file is now about 5 lines.
More crap removed.
Added a wearing handler.
Moved all the timers out of process they are now handled by the event manager
Conventions are now included in most of the files. (Takes ages)

Updates from V3
The client .java is now only 24k lines
I have spent a lot of the saving methods in this version:
No longer saves in .dats
Handler for the saving methods.
Moved some ints from client.java to player.java
Deleted quite a lot of unnessary stuff
You would not believe the amount of trash I found.
Removed some useless handlers e.g Savegamehandler and another one playersave or something.

Updates from V2
Cleaned further.
Command Handler.
Action button handler.
Fully working ip ban(Done properly)
Completely configured to work with Stewie’s client
No long runs like a Czar I prefer to think of it as running like a Tate.
Seperated Java and Class files.

Server download:)
http://uppit.com/v/4YM1XH4B

Client(100% credits to stewie)
http://www.mediafire.com/?dzogyc1jmwz

Read full topic
